gameframework.particles.behaviors.ParticleBehavior

    • Uses of ParticleBehavior in gameframework.particles.behaviors

      Subclasses of ParticleBehavior in gameframework.particles.behaviors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultParticleBehavior
      Default behavior of a particle This behavior should do nothing to the particle
      class  DelayedParticleBehavior
      This behavior will add a delay before the next particle appears So, if you emit 50 particles with this behavior, the first particle will be shown instantly, the second after 1*delay, the third after 2*delay, and so on until the fiftieth particle (shown after 49*delay)
      class  DyingParticleBehavior
      This behavior will remove the particle after a certain time
      class  GravityParticleBehavior
      This behavior applies a gravitational force to every particle So it will gradually increase the y position of every particle
      class  MovingParticleBehavior
      This behavior will move the particles at a specified speed and angle
      class  ParticleBehaviorMock 
      Methods in gameframework.particles.behaviors that return ParticleBehavior
